messages.subject: Re: Legendary weapons
messages.msgSnippet: As far as the samurai archives goes, the short answer is no.  There are too many sword sites and sword experts out there to warrant a treatment from us, who
messages.messageBody:
As far as the samurai archives goes, the short answer is no. There
are too many sword sites and sword experts out there to warrant a
treatment from us, who lack said sword expertise. We would accept
articles for the featured articles section in regards to weaponry,
however, as it is lacking from the page.


--- In samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com, "It isnt James"
<tjkirk1977@y...> wrote:
> Does anyone know if the Samurai Archives web page is planning on
> doing a section for this?
> Does anyone know of any good web pages that might have backrounds
on
> these?
